x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x hi x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x {ANŠE}KUR.RA-MEŠ x x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x ki-i {LU₂}EN.NAM x+x x x x x x x x x x x e-mu-qi₂ il-tap-ru LUGAL mim-ma x x x x x x x x x ina ku-un ŠA₃-bi-šu₂-nu la it-tak₂-lu na-a-x x x x x x x x x x+x KUR-URI{KI} u KUR-aš-šur{KI} ul-te-eg-lu-ma šum-ma x x x x x iṣ-ṣab-tu-ma šum-ma a-na {URU}bi-ra-a-ti a-na šu-lu-ti x x x x x x+x šum-ma {1}šam-ši-{d}IM a-mat {MI₂}HUL ša₂ {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-re-man-ni x x x x x x LUGAL iq-ta-bu-u₂ um-ma du-u₂-ku nu-up-pil ṣu-ub-bit o šum-ma {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-MU-MU LUGAL il-te-mu-šu-ma šum-ma x x x x x x+x-šu-ma IGI.2 še-pi-tu ŠU.SI ta-ra-ṣu x x x x x x+x u KUR-šu ul-x-šu-ma hu-ub-ta-a-ni o x x x x x x x ut-tir-ru-ma it-tan-nu-ma mun-nab-tu x x x x x x in-na-bi-tu-ni LUGAL la i-qab-ba-aš₂-šu₂ o ša₂ ina ŠA₃ a-de-e an-nu-ti i-haṭ-ṭu-u₂ la il-ka-šu o il-la-ku x x x x x x-nu {d}AMAR.UTU EN GAL-u₂ ša₂ a-mat-su ina mah-ri DU-ku o x x x x x x x+x la ša₂-lam-šu u sa-pa-ah UN-MEŠ-šu₂ o x x x x x liq-bi ZI-šu₂ GIM A-MEŠ lit-bu-uk KUR-su li-hal-liq ina bu-bu-ti u hu-šah-hi UN-MEŠ-šu₂ li-šam-qit o x x x x x x x-li li-ir-di-šu {d}AG DUMU.UŠ ṣi-ru o x x x x x x+x gal-le-e lem-nu-ti la i-gam-mi-la nap-šat-su {d}a-num a-bi DINGIR-MEŠ {GIŠ}PA-šu₂ liš-bir d.EN.LIL₂ be-lum mu-šim NAM-MEŠ ša₂ qi₂-bit-sa la ut-tak-ka-ru pa-le-e ta-ne₂-hi UD-MEŠ i-ṣu-ti MU-MEŠ hu-šah-hi a-na šim-ti li-šim-šu₂ {d}NIN.LIL₂ um-mu GAL-tu ša₂ qi₂-bit-sa i-na E₂.KUR kab-ta-at a-šar šip-ṭi u EŠ.BAR i-na ma-har d.EN.LIL₂ a-bu-us-su a.a iṣ-bat {d}E₂.A NUN.ME DINGIR-MEŠ mu-de-e mim-ma šum-šu ID₂-MEŠ-šu₂ ina nag-bi lis-kir {d}UTU da-a.a-nu GAL-u₂ ša₂ AN-e u KI.TIM muš-te-šir šik-nat ZI-tim EN tukul-ti šar-ru-su li-is-kip di-in-šu a.a i-di-in {d}30 EN AN-e ša₂ še-ret-su ina DINGIR-MEŠ šu-pa-at o x x x x šir-ta ra-bi-ta ša₂ ina SU-šu₂ la KUR₂-ru li-mid-su-ma UD-MEŠ ITI-MEŠ MU-MEŠ pa-le-e-šu₂ i-na ta-ne₂-hi u₃ dim-ma-ti li-šaq-ti {d}IM GU₂.GAL AN-e u KI.TIM A.AN ina AN-e A.KAL ina nag-bi li-ṭir-šu KUR-su ina hu-šah-hi li-hal-liq o UGU URU-šu₂ ez-zi-iš li-is-si-ma KUR-su a-na DU₆ a-bu-bi li-tir {d}za-ba₄-ba₄ qar-ra-du GAL-u a-li-ku x x x
